public interface ITmtsViewGroup
extends ITmtsView

Interface for Android ViewGroup.

字段摘要

LOG_TAG
 
方法摘要
<T extends TmtsView>
T
getChildByIndex(int index, java.lang.Class<T> caster)
          Return child view by the given index and return type in ViewGroup.
 
从接口 com.taobao.tmts.framework.viewelememt.ITmtsView 继承的方法
doClick, doLongClick, fetchText, findTmtsViewById, getHeight, getId, getLocation, getWidth, isDisplayed, isEnabled, isSelected, requestFocus, scrollBy, scrollTo
 

方法详细信息

getChildByIndex

<T extends TmtsView> T getChildByIndex(int index,
                                       java.lang.Class<T> caster)
Return child view by the given index and return type in ViewGroup.

类型参数：
T - The TmtsView subclass to return.
参数：
index - Index of the child.
caster - The TmtsView subclass to return.
返回：
Child view by the given index and return type in ViewGroup.
